casebody.data:
STATE
v.
William Henry RAINES. No. 211A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 22, 2006. Jonathan E. Broun, Durham, for Raines. William P. Hart, Senior Deputy Attorney General, Joan Cunningham, Assistant Attorney General, Jeff Hunt, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th day of December 2006 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (William Henry Raines) shall have up to and including the 1st day of February 2007 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 22nd day of December 2006."
